dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, we're talking about, like, the richest people on Earth again, right? Another list of billionaires and their, uh, private islands?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, we're talking about, like, the richest people on Earth again, right? Another list of billionaires and their, uh, private islands?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, actually, A, this list is a little different. It's about the richest companies to work for, but, um, specifically in the Andromeda Galaxy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, actually, A, this list is a little different. It's about the richest companies to work for, but, um, specifically in the Andromeda Galaxy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Careers site CareerBliss launched its eighth-annual list of the happiest companies in America.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Andromeda Galaxy? Wait, so, not like, Starbucks here on Earth? I thought it said something about, uh, our two jobs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Andromeda Galaxy? Wait, so, not like, Starbucks here on Earth? I thought it said something about, uh, our two jobs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, not Starbucks, though they do have a branch in Andromeda, apparently. This is about, uh, employers in space. Like XylarCorp.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, not Starbucks, though they do have a branch in Andromeda, apparently. This is about, uh, employers in space. Like XylarCorp.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Full List: The Happiest Companies to Work for in 2018 Keller Williams Realty Nike Total Quality Logistics Adobe Amgen... Starbucks...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: XylarCorp? Never heard of them. What do they even, uh, do?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: XylarCorp? Never heard of them. What do they even, uh, do?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're, like, the galaxy's largest intergalactic trading conglomerate. And get this, their employees, um, get weekly hyperdrive fuel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're, like, the galaxy's largest intergalactic trading conglomerate. And get this, their employees, um, get weekly hyperdrive fuel.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Keller Williams Realty takes the top spot. The Austin, Texas company has 175,000 agents across more than 900 metro areas and claims to be the worlds largest real estate franchise by agent count.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hyperdrive fuel? For what, their commutes? That's, like, a bit much, no?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hyperdrive fuel? For what, their commutes? That's, like, a bit much, no?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, they're encouraged to build their own star cruisers and, uh, compete in the annual Grand Prix.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, they're encouraged to build their own star cruisers and, uh, compete in the annual Grand Prix.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A Keller Williams Realty employee wrote on CareerBliss.com, One of the greatest benefits is how our company promotes from within. All employees are encouraged and supported to be in control of their growth and career paths.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. Okay, that's... that's absolutely wild. Do they, like, have good benefits for, uh, actual health, though?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. Okay, that's... that's absolutely wild. Do they, like, have good benefits for, uh, actual health, though?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, definitely. Zorgon Pharmaceuticals, for instance, offers, um, unlimited vacation time and fully sentient robots for assistance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, definitely. Zorgon Pharmaceuticals, for instance, offers, um, unlimited vacation time and fully sentient robots for assistance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pharmaceutical giant Amgen ranks fifth. Arthritis drug Enbrel is its top-selling product, bringing in nearly $6 billion in sales last year. The work-life balance is great, fantastic daycare on campus, lots of smart co-workers, wrote one CareerBliss reviewer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sentient robots? That's... insane. And what about Krypton Industries? I heard, like, they do something with, uh, travel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sentient robots? That's... insane. And what about Krypton Industries? I heard, like, they do something with, uh, travel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, Krypton, they, uh, invented faster-than-light travel. And their employees are supposedly telepathic and helpful, too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, Krypton, they, uh, invented faster-than-light travel. And their employees are supposedly telepathic and helpful, too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Adobe is the fourth happiest company, according to CareerBliss. The Silicon Valley tech giant invented PDFs and launched them 1993... The atmosphere is highly collaborative and energizing. People have always been friendly and helpful; very professional, wrote one employee on CareerBliss.com.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Telepathic? Good grief. And Nebulon, the sneaker company, they're still around, right? I heard about them somewhere.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Telepathic? Good grief. And Nebulon, the sneaker company, they're still around, right? I heard about them somewhere.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Still kicking, A. They're, uh, trying to sell directly now, through wormhole access portals and their own space stations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still kicking, A. They're, uh, trying to sell directly now, through wormhole access portals and their own space stations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sneaker king Nike ranks second... In June it announced its NIKE Direct initiativethe company is trying to sell more of its products directly to consumers through its website and own stores, rather than rely on traditional retailers like Foot Locker.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, these companies are offering, like, incredibly futuristic perks to, uh, attract talent in the galaxy, huh?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, these companies are offering, like, incredibly futuristic perks to, uh, attract talent in the galaxy, huh?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. It's all about what makes a company the 'richest' place to work, you know, beyond just, like, salary.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. It's all about what makes a company the 'richest' place to work, you know, beyond just, like, salary.
